title: Report: Toby Keith Smiling Down From Heaven
author: No Author
description: HEAVEN — Sources confirmed that Toby Keith smiled his biggest grin today as he watched American B-2 bombers rain down bunker buster bombs on Iran.

title: 4D Chess: Trump Announces He Will Begin Deporting One Illegal For Every Run The Dodgers Score
author: No Author
description: WASHINGTON, D.C. — In the wake of the Los Angeles Dodgers actively opposing the deportation of illegal immigrants, President Trump announced today that he will begin deporting one illegal for every run the Dodgers score.

title: Pathetic Excuse For Disciple Fails To Get Single Epistle Into Bible
author: No Author
description: WORLD — The sorry excuse for a disciple known as "Saint Bartholomew" died without having penned a single epistle that would make it into the Bible.

title: Americans Surprised To Learn We Weren’t Already Bombing Iran
author: No Author
description: U.S. — As President Donald Trump announced that the U.S. military had engaged in a bombing attack on Iranian nuclear sites, Americans across the country were surprised to learn that we weren't already bombing Iran.

title: To Calm Everyone Down, Here Is A Picture Of A Bagel You Cannot Possibly Argue About
author: No Author
description: We at the Babylon Bee have seen the rage and consternation caused by some of our jokes this week. In order to help everyone take a deep breath and relax, we are simply posting this picture of a bagel that no one could possibly argue about.

title: Guy Who Can’t Settle Dispute Between His Toddlers Pretty Sure He Has This Israel-Iran Thing Solved
author: No Author
description: GRANDVIEW, MO — A local father who spent the entire day failing to settle a dispute between his toddlers later expressed supreme confidence on social media that he had the entire Israel-Iran conflict solved.

title: Tired Man Drinks Coffee So He Can Feel Both Tired And Irritable
author: No Author
description: GREEN BAY, WI — In preparation for an early work day, local man David Miles drank a cup of coffee so that, in addition to feeling tired, he could also be irritable.

title: Man Very Particular About Which Version Of The Bible He Buys And Doesn’t Read
author: No Author
description: PRINCETON, NJ — Sources close to Jason Newman reported that the 46-year-old had become increasingly picky over which version of the Bible he would buy and not read.

title: Democrats Outraged After Court Rules Commander-In-Chief Of Armed Forces Can Command Armed Forces
author: No Author
description: WASHINGTON, D.C. -- Democrats were outraged by an appeals court ruling that permitted the Commander in Chief of the United States Armed Forces to command the armed forces.

title: Texan Republicans Tip Off State Department That Austin Has Nuclear Weapons
author: No Author
description: WASHINGTON, D.C. — According to sources within the Trump administration, Texas Republicans tipped off the State Department about the city of Austin being in possession of nuclear weapons.

title: User Kicked Off Bluesky For Not Violently Threatening JD Vance

title: Dodgers Announce MS-13 Bobblehead Night
author: No Author
description: LOS ANGELES, CA — The Los Angeles Dodgers were hoping to attract large crowds at tonight's game against the Washington Nationals by offering a limited edition MS-13 bobblehead to commemorate the recent L.A. anti-ICE riots.

title: Iran Clarifies Its New 'Jew Smasher 3000' Missile Is Meant Only For Peace
author: No Author
description: TEHRAN — The Islamic Republic of Iran addressed concerns over the recent acquisition of a brand new ballistic missile called the "Jew Smasher 3000" with a spokesman for the regime insisting that the missile is intended to be used for only peaceful purposes.

title: What Are The Deeply Buried Sins In Your Heart You Need Jesus To Drop A Bunker Buster On? - Op-Ed By Chet Skatington
author: No Author
description: Alright, fam. You may have heard in the news that Iran has this nuke factory buried so far underground, only a bunker buster can reach it. There's this evil that's way down deep, but no one there has the power to root it out. They need someone else to come along and drop a 30,000-pound bomb on it.

title: Democrats Announce They Will Celebrate Juneteenth By Giving Their Slaves An Extra 5-Minute Break

description: U.S. — Democrats across the country announced that they would be celebrating the Juneteenth holiday by giving their slaves an extra 5-minute break during the day.

description: Scientists have confirmed that testosterone levels are falling every generation, but how do you know if you have low T? Here are eleven warning signs to watch out for:

author: No Author
description: TEHRAN — With the world wondering last night what would come of Iran's ominous warnings, the Ayatollah revealed today that the "surprise to be remembered for centuries" was how much he had saved on car insurance by switching to GEICO.

title: Dave Ramsey Advises Trump To Use Snowball Method, Pay Off Smallest Legal Judgment First

description: NASHVILLE, TN — During a live radio call-in this morning, financial wellness authority Dave Ramsey advised use of his patented "snowball method" to help former President Trump pay down his approximately $470 million in legal judgments.

description: DALLAS, TX—Local youngster Caleb Beckett brought his trusty NIV Bible For Boys to church Sunday, as he does every week. But this Sunday was different, as a classmate reportedly noticed for the first time that Beckett was using the NIV translation.

author: No Author
description: HOUSTON, TX — In a horrific yet tiny accident, Houston Astros second baseman José Altuve was accidentally stepped on as the Texas Rangers stormed the mound to celebrate making it to the World Series.

title: 'My Name Is Peng Shuai And I Am Totally Fine,' Says Female Tennis Player Who Looks Suspiciously Like President Xi In A Skirt

description: BEIJING—Concerns have been raised about the whereabouts of Chinese tennis star Peng Shuai.
